sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Pie, PieChart, Cell, Legend, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import './DeckersData.css'; function DeckersData() { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('financials'); const [yearRange, setYearRange] = useState('5year'); // Deckers Financial Data - 5 Year Historical Metrics const historicalFinancials = { 'FY2025': { revenue: '$4.96B', eps: 'Record High', operatingMargin: '23.6%', marketCap: '$24.14B', repurchases: '$567M', netIncome: 'Strong Growth', year: 'FY 2025' }, 'FY2024': { revenue: '$4.27B', eps: 'Prior Year', operatingMargin: '21.6%', marketCap: 'N/A', repurchases: 'N/A', netIncome: 'Growth', year: 'FY 2024' }, 'FY2023': { revenue: '$3.67B', eps: 'Growing', operatingMargin: '20.2%', marketCap: 'N/A', repurchases: 'N/A', netIncome: 'Growth', year: 'FY 2023' }, 'FY2022': { revenue: '$3.24B', eps: 'Prior', operatingMargin: '19.8%', marketCap: 'N/A', repurchases: 'N/A', netIncome: 'Growth', year: 'FY 2022' }, 'FY2021': { revenue: '$2.91B', eps: 'Growing', operatingMargin: '18.5%', marketCap: 'N/A', repurchases: 'N/A', netIncome: 'Growth', year: 'FY 2021' } }; // Deckers Financial Data - Current Year const financialMetrics = [ { metric: 'Revenue', value: '$4.96B', previous: '$4.27B', growth: '16%' }, { metric: 'Earnings Per Share (EPS)', value: '+30%', previous: 'Prior Year', growth: '30%' }, { metric: 'Operating Margin', value: '23.6%', previous: '21.6%', growth: '200 bps' }, { metric: 'Market Cap (Sept 30, 2024)', value: '$24.14B', previous: 'N/A', growth: 'N/A' }, { metric: 'Share Repurchases', value: '$567M', previous: 'FY 2025', growth: 'Ongoing' }, { metric: 'Repurchase Authorization', value: '$2.25B', previous: 'May 2025', growth: 'Approved' }, { metric: 'Outstanding Shares', value: '149.44M', previous: 'May 9, 2025', growth: 'N/A' }, ]; const brandPerformance = [ { brand: 'HOKA', revenue: '$2.2B', growth: '24%', status: 'Fastest Growing', position: '2nd' }, { brand: 'UGG', revenue: '$2.5B', growth: '13%', status: 'Outstanding', position: '1st' }, { brand: 'Other Brands', revenue: 'Remaining', growth: 'Varied', status: 'Diverse', position: '3rd+' }, ]; // Pie Chart Data for Brand Revenue Distribution const brandChartData = [ { name: 'UGG', value: 2.5, fill: '#9b59b6' }, { name: 'HOKA', value: 2.2, fill: '#e67e22' }, { name: 'Other Brands', value: 0.26, fill: '#95a5a6' } ]; const narrativeSummary = { company: 'Deckers Outdoor Corporation', mission: 'Global leader in designing, marketing, and distributing innovative footwear, apparel, and accessories', headquarters: 'Goleta, California', exchange: 'New York Stock Exchange (Ticker: DECK)', highlights: [ 'Record-breaking earnings per share (30% above prior year)', 'Revenue reaching nearly $5 billion (16% YoY growth)', 'Fifth consecutive year of double-digit growth', 'Operating margin of 23.6% (200 basis point improvement)', 'HOKA: 24% growth with expanded active lifestyle market', 'UGG: 13% growth with strong global expansion', ], }; const operationsPlan = [ { area: 'Distribution Channels', details: [ 'Direct-to-Consumer (DTC): E-commerce & retail stores', 'Wholesale: Specialty, department stores, online marketplaces', 'Partner Retail: Third-party international operations', ], }, { area: 'Supply Chain', details: [ 'Extended design cycle (months-long planning)', 'Pre-season orders: Up to 12 months in advance', 'In-season orders: Immediate shipment capability', 'Global warehouses and 3PL partnerships', ], }, { area: 'Product Strategy', details: [ 'HOKA: Active lifestyle innovation focus', 'UGG: Year-round wearability & mens category expansion', 'Continuous disruptive innovation', 'SKU productivity and inventory turnover optimization', ], }, { area: 'International Expansion', details: [ 'Flexible distribution model transitions', 'Geographic and market positioning optimization', 'Partner retail program expansion', 'Multi-market supply chain management', ], }, ]; // Cash Flow Analysis const cashFlowData = { fy2025: { operating: { amount: '$1,044.5M', change: '+$11.3M (+1.1%)', drivers: [ 'Net income after non-cash adjustments: +$217.3M', 'Changes in operating assets & liabilities: -$206.0M offset' ], details: 'Driven by strong net income and operational efficiency. Primary liquidity source for the company.' }, investing: { amount: '-$75.0M', change: '+$14.3M improvement (16.0%)', drivers: [ 'Increased cash proceeds from asset sales', 'Capital expenditures for facilities and infrastructure', 'Technology and operational investments' ], details: 'Investing activities decreased as company maintained disciplined capital allocation while investing in growth.' }, financing: { amount: '-$581.3M', change: '-$163.7M increase in use (39.2%)', drivers: [ 'Share repurchases: $567M', 'Excise taxes on buybacks', 'Higher shareholder return activities' ], details: 'Increased use reflects aggressive capital return strategy with significant share buybacks and dividend payments.' } }, fy2024: { operating: { amount: '$1,033.2M' }, investing: { amount: '-$89.3M' }, financing: { amount: '-$417.7M' } }, summary: { netCashChange: '$387.1M', previousNetChange: '$520.3M', foreignExchange: '-$1.0M impact' } }; // Cash Flow Drivers and Explanations const cashFlowExplanations = { operatingCashFlow: { title: 'Operating Cash Flow', emoji: 'ðŸ’µ', amount: '$1,044.5M', explanation: 'Cash generated from core business operations. This is the lifeblood of the company.', details: [ 'Net Income â†’ Converted to cash after accounting for non-cash items', 'Depreciation & Amortization â†’ Added back (non-cash expense)', 'Changes in Working Capital â†’ Impacts cash timing', 'Trade receivables management â†’ Critical for cash collection', 'Inventory management â†’ Higher purchases to support demand', 'Payables management â†’ Timing of disbursements' ], keyPoints: [ 'âœ… Stable growth of +1.1% YoY ($11.3M increase)', 'âœ… Strong operational efficiency with favorable net income adjustments (+$217.3M)', 'âœ… Partially offset by working capital investments (-$206.0M)', 'âœ… Primary source of liquidity for business operations' ] }, investingCashFlow: { title: 'Investing Cash Flow', emoji: 'ðŸ“Š', amount: '-$75.0M', explanation: 'Cash used for long-term investments and capital expenditures. Improved by 16% vs prior year.', details: [ 'Capital Expenditures â†’ Building warehouses, distribution centers, retail stores', 'Property & Equipment â†’ Infrastructure investments for growth', 'Technology Investments â†’ E-commerce platforms and systems', 'Asset Sales â†’ Proceeds from divestitures and equipment sales', 'Business Acquisitions â†’ Strategic investments if applicable', 'Financial Instruments â†’ Working capital and strategic investments' ], keyPoints: [ 'âœ… Decreased from -$89.3M to -$75.0M (16% improvement)', 'âœ… Increased asset sales generating additional cash', 'âœ… Disciplined capital allocation maintaining growth investments', 'âœ… Shows financial flexibility and operational efficiency' ] }, financingCashFlow: { title: 'Financing Cash Flow', emoji: 'ðŸ’°', amount: '-$581.3M', explanation: 'Cash used for capital returns to shareholders and debt management. Shows strong capital return commitment.', details: [ 'Share Repurchases â†’ $567M (main driver)', 'Excise Taxes â†’ Additional taxes on buybacks', 'Dividend Payments â†’ Cash returned to shareholders', 'Debt Repayment â†’ If applicable', 'Debt Issuance â†’ If applicable', 'Option Exercises â†’ Employee stock option proceeds' ], keyPoints: [ 'âœ… Increased from -$417.7M to -$581.3M (+39.2%)', 'âœ… Share buybacks demonstrate management confidence', 'âœ… Strong balance sheet enables significant capital returns', 'âœ… Board approved additional $2.25B authorization (May 2025)' ] }, freecashFlow: { title: 'Free Cash Flow Analysis', emoji: 'ðŸŽ¯', explanation: 'Operating Cash Flow minus Capital Expenditures. Shows cash available for shareholder returns.', calculation: 'FCF = Operating Cash Flow - Capital Expenditures', fy2025: { operatingCF: '$1,044.5M', capex: '~$75M', estimatedFCF: '~$969.5M', quality: 'Excellent' }, insights: [ 'âœ… Robust free cash flow generation', 'âœ… Supports aggressive share buyback program', 'âœ… Maintains capital for strategic investments', 'âœ… Provides financial flexibility for opportunities' ] } }; // Financial Ratios - Based on Available Data const financialRatios = { profitability: [ { ratio: 'Operating Margin', fy2025: '23.6%', fy2024: '21.6%', fy2023: '20.2%', definition: 'Operating Income / Revenue. Measures operational efficiency.', trend: 'â†‘ Improving' }, { ratio: 'EPS Growth', fy2025: '+30%', fy2024: 'N/A', fy2023: 'N/A', definition: 'Earnings Per Share growth rate.', trend: 'â†‘ Strong Growth' }, { ratio: 'Revenue Growth', fy2025: '16%', fy2024: '16%', fy2023: '12%', definition: 'Year-over-year revenue growth rate.', trend: 'â†‘ Consistent' } ], efficiency: [ { ratio: 'Revenue per Dollar of Assets', fy2025: 'Strong', fy2024: 'Growing', fy2023: 'Growing', definition: 'Asset Turnover - measures asset utilization efficiency.', trend: 'â†‘ Improving' }, { ratio: 'Working Capital Management', fy2025: 'Optimized', fy2024: 'Improved', fy2023: 'Standard', definition: 'Inventory turnover and cash conversion cycle optimization.', trend: 'â†‘ Optimized' }, { ratio: 'Inventory Turnover Focus', fy2025: 'High Priority', fy2024: 'Key Focus', fy2023: 'Managed', definition: 'SKU productivity and inventory optimization initiatives.', trend: 'â†‘ Strategic Focus' } ], leverage: [ { ratio: 'Debt Position', fy2025: 'Strong Balance Sheet', fy2024: 'Solid', fy2023: 'Solid', definition: 'Company has strong balance sheet with minimal leverage.', trend: 'â†‘ Strong' }, { ratio: 'Capital Allocation', fy2025: '$567M Repurchases', fy2024: 'N/A', fy2023: 'N/A', definition: 'Share buybacks demonstrate confidence and shareholder returns.', trend: 'â†‘ Active' }, { ratio: 'Financial Flexibility', fy2025: 'High', fy2024: 'High', fy2023: 'Good', definition: 'Cash position and debt capacity for investments.', trend: 'â†‘ Strong' } ] }; return (
